definition: A term used to describe a state of emotional or mental composure, often associated with the ability to remain calm and composed in difficult or challenging situations. It is commonly used to refer to a person's ability to maintain their self-control and not become overwhelmed by their emotions or circumstances.

examples.german: Die Fassung des Films war sehr emotional.
examples.english: The version of the film was very emotional.

examples.german: Er verlor die Fassung und schrie laut.
examples.english: He lost his composure and shouted loudly.

examples.german: Die Fassung des Buches wurde mehrmals überarbeitet.
examples.english: The edition of the book was revised several times.

examples.german: Sie konnte ihre Fassung bewahren und blieb ruhig.
examples.english: She managed to keep her composure and remained calm.

examples.german: Die Fassung des Gemäldes wurde restauriert.
examples.english: The frame of the painting was restored.
